Activity: Arrive at work, check personal emails, and browse some art websites for inspiration.
Check work emails. Respond to any updates from @helpdesk-1 regarding the lab result access issue. If resolved, proceed with the incomplete records from yesterday. If not, follow up again.
Abstract data from another batch of 25 electronic records. Focus on extracting data related to antiviral medication prescriptions (e.g., oseltamivir dosage and duration).
Take a break to listen to some music and browse social media.
Continue data abstraction, working on the next 25 records. If lab access is still an issue, shift focus to records where lab data is not essential or is already available.
Lunch Break: Relax and have lunch with colleagues in the cafeteria.
Resume data abstraction. Aim to complete another batch of 50 records today.
Collaborate with @his-1 (Health Informatics Specialist) to clarify any ambiguities regarding the coding of specific influenza-related complications.
Continue with data abstraction until the end of the workday.
Review and correct any errors in the day's completed records. Update the daily log.
Head home after a productive day.
